name: Midnight Mass
description: Banished to Hell for committing unspeakable sins, you play as Demonique who has been given with one task; destroy the corrupt monarchy that threatens to disrupt the balance of life. This chosen demon is one of the many demons known as ‘The Wicked’ who have attempted to complete the task of making their way to the top of the colossal tower of hell to confront and defeat the dangerous leader known as Orbo aka ‘The Church’.
